channel.title: Ctf on pramana's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ctf on pramana's blog

item.title: My first CTF: HackMIT 2023's puzzle
item.description: On July 4th, MIT emailed all applicants to their hackathon, HackMIT, that they have started a puzzle, where the top 50 competitors would be granted admission into HackMIT. Taking their advice, I went to checking the website. In the FAQ section, I noticed something new: What does it mean? The strange placement of upper/lowercase letters and the length of all words being the same made me think some message was being hidden here in binary.
